_header: The grace of the Holy Ghost
Title(s): ‘Þe xv tokenys before the day of dome’
_description: ‘Þe xv tokenys before the day of dome’ — 398 lines in couplets

CULFf238.First Lines:
The grace of the holy gosteThat ys ay stedfasteBe now amonge
                    vsAnd þat graunt vs swete ihesu…
CULFf238.Last Lines:
…That we may to the blysse wendeThat lastyth ay wyth owten
                    ende
CULFf238.Attributed Title:
here foloweþ þe xv tokenys be fore the day of dome (f.
                        50va)
